cgcloud__Fund_Transaction_Header__c.name: cgcloud__Fund_Transaction_Header__c
cgcloud__Fund_Transaction_Header__c.description: Fund Transaction Header object facilitates the creation of multiple fund transactions in either a multiple source or target fund business scenario. This object dictates key fields such as the fund transaction template. The source or target funds for the fund transaction records to be created are based on transaction types such as Transfer, drawback, and more.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Amount__c.description: Sum of the amount of all related transactions.

cgcloud__Currency__c.description: Stores the Currency set by the selected template based on Sales Org.

cgcloud__Fund_Description__c.description: Stores the description of the selected source or target fund, where applicable,.

cgcloud__Fund_Transaction_Template_Descr.description: Description value of the transaction's related Fund Transaction Template.

cgcloud__Fund_Transaction_Template__c.description: Fund Transaction Template that dictates the behavior of related transactions based on the template's Transaction Type.

cgcloud__Source_Fund__c.description: Source Fund to be selected for transactions based on Template Transaction Type.

cgcloud__Status__c.description: Status field for the fund transaction header.

cgcloud__Target_Fund__c.description: Source Fund to be selected for transactions based on Template Transaction Type.

cgcloud__Transaction_Type__c.description: Stores the transaction type of the selected fund transaction template.
